body_html:
Where exactly do you fill with a 0? Since in the case of out-of-bounds there is nothing to fill...

I'm totally fine with not checking bounds on the GPU but I think it would be very helpful to state in the documentation that on CPU the bounds are checked but on GPU they are not.
body_text:

I'm totally fine with not checking bounds on the GPU but I think it would be very helpful to state in the documentation that on CPU the bounds are checked but on GPU they are not.
body:
Where exactly do you fill with a 0? Since in the case of out-of-bounds there is nothing to fill...

I'm totally fine with not checking bounds on the GPU but I think it would be very helpful to state in the documentation that on CPU the bounds are checked but on GPU they are not.
